column4: Sorry if im going about this the wrong way, but who do i ask my question to or should i just ask in the channel

a) don't paste large bloccks of text in the channel.  b) don't use the enter key as puncuation;  type your whole question in one line.  c) use family-appropriate language, d) don't use AOL-isms and chat short-hand, e) Be clear as to what exactly is the  question, f) if nobody answers, that's probably because nobody knows, or the people who do know aren'there.
Oh, to paste large blocks of text, use pastebin.com
